data.name: strAliasText
data.value: alias

data.name: strDefQuitMsg
data.value: Best Chat has exited.

data.name: strGlobalAliasesDesc
data.value: Lists custom command sets you can run as one.

data.name: strGlobalAliasesTitle
data.value: Aliases

data.name: strGlobalAltNicksDesc
data.value: Enter any alternate nicks that Best Chat should use if your normal nick isn't available. You don't need to include your default nick.

data.name: strGlobalAltNicksTitle
data.value: Alterate Nicks

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformDesc
data.value: Groups tasks that Best Chat runs at select events. These are all commands you were otherwise enter from the input box and can include those from plugins and aliases.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformTitle
data.value: Auto-perform

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningChanDesc
data.value: Enter commands to run when joining a channel on any network. This might be overridden by the settings for each network and further by individual channels.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningChanTitle
data.value: When joining a channel on any network

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningNetDesc
data.value: Enter any commands to run when you join any network. Thise can include commands from plugins and aliases.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningNetTitle
data.value: When joining a network

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenOpeningUserChatDesc
data.value: Enter commands to run when opening a user chat on any network. This might be overridden by the settings for each network.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenOpeningUserChatTitle
data.value: When opening a user chat on any network

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenStartingBestChatDesc
data.value: Enter any commands to run when Best Chat starts. This can include plugins and aliases.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenStartingBestChatTitle
data.value: When Starting Best Chat

data.name: strGlobalConnAutoReconnectDesc
data.value: When your connection is lost unexpectedly, Best Chat can automatically reconnect to the server for you.

data.name: strGlobalConnAutoReconnectTitle
data.value: Reconnect when disconnected unexpectedly

data.name: strGlobalConnCharEncodingDesc
data.value: For multiple clients to correctly read messages with non-ASCII characters on IRC, they need to use the same character encoding.

data.name: strGlobalConnCharEncodingTitle
data.value: C_haracter Encoding

data.name: strGlobalConnDefQuitMsgDesc
data.value: Specifies a default quit message to use when on is not explicitly specified for a network or via the /quit command.

data.name: strGlobalConnDefQuitMsgTitle
data.value: Default Quit _Message

data.name: strGlobalConnDesc
data.value: These preferences affect how Best Chat connects to the Internet.

data.name: strGlobalConnEnableIdentDesc
data.value: Allows Best Chat to connect to servers that require an ident response

data.name: strGlobalConnEnableIdentTitle
data.value: Enable _Identification Server during connection process

data.name: strGlobalConnMaxAttemptsDesc
data.value: This is number of times Best Chat attempts to connect to a server or network. A value of 1 means Best Chat will never attempt to reconnect to the server.

data.name: strGlobalConnMaxAttemptsTitle
data.value: Maximum Connection _Attempts:

data.name: strGlobalConnRejoinAfterKickDesc
data.value: If this is turned on, Best Chat will try (only once) to rejoin a channel you got kicked from. Note: Some channels dislike auto-rejoin and will ban you. So be careful.

data.name: strGlobalConnRejoinAfterKickTitle
data.value: R_ejoin when kicked

data.name: strGlobalConnTitle
data.value: _Connection

data.name: strGlobalConnUnlimitedAttemptsDesc
data.value: If checked, Best Chat will attempt to reconnect to any server forever. If unchecked, the limit will be to the right.

data.name: strGlobalConnUnlimitedAttemptsTitle
data.value: Unlimited Attempts?

data.name: strGlobalDccDesc
data.value: DCC lets you bypass a server once you connected in order to talk to a specific user, send them files, or receive files from them. Use this tab to control those settings.

data.name: strGlobalDccDownloadsFolderDesc
data.value: Specifies where to save all files received via DCC

data.name: strGlobalDccDownloadsFolderTitle
data.value: Downloads Folder

data.name: strGlobalDccEnabledDesc
data.value: You must check this to allow Best Chat to use DCC. Otherwise, all DCC chats will be blocked and DCC won't appear in the menus.

data.name: strGlobalDccEnabledTitle
data.value: Enabled

data.name: strGlobalDccGetIpFromServerDesc
data.value: If checked, Best Chat will ask the server for the IP address to use.

data.name: strGlobalDccGetIpFromServerTitle
data.value: Get the local IP from the server

data.name: strGlobalDccTitle
data.value: DCC (Direct Client Chat)

data.name: strGlobalDesc
data.value: Contains all global IRC settings

data.name: strGlobalStalkWordsDesc
data.value: Enter any strings you want to trigger a notify besides your nick. This could be anything you're interested in, "@op", "@room", etc. Your nick is implied. If you turned on Agressive Notify in the application's main preferences, Best Chat will try to get your attention

data.name: strGlobalStalkWordsTitle
data.value: Stalk Words

data.name: strGlobalTitle
data.value: Global

data.name: strIrcRootDesc
data.value: All IRC specific settings are here.

data.name: strIrcRootTitle
data.value: IRC

data.name: strNetAliasDesc
data.value: Use if you want {0} to have a different set of aliases from what are available by default in Best Chat IRC. This can be overridden again for each channel once you join. Note: Having aliases that exist in some views but not others can be confusing.

data.name: strNetAliasesAdditionalDesc
data.value: If you need more aliases than what {0} inherits from the global IRC settings, list them here.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAliasesAdditionalTitle
data.value: List any extra aliases you want defined for use in views associated with {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAliasesInheritedDesc
data.value: {0} inherits a list of aliases from the global IRC settings. You can disable any or all of them here. You can override this for individual channels once you visit them.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAliasesInheritedTitle
data.value: Which Inherited Aliases are Enabled for {0}?
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAliasTitle
data.value: Aliases that exist only for {0}

data.name: strNetAltNicksAdditionalDesc
data.value: Use to specify additional nicks you want to be available for {0}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAltNicksAdditionalTitle
data.value: Lists more alternate nicks specific to {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAltNicksDesc
data.value: If you prefer {0} to use different alternate nicks than what you use for the rest of Best Chat IRC, this tab lets you do that.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAltNicksInheritedDesc
data.value: {0} inherits a list of alternate nicks from the global IRC settings. You can diable any or all of them. The entries that are enabled are tried before any entries below and in the order shown. If you need another order, disable entries as needed and recreate them below.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAltNicksInheritedTitle
data.value: {0} has these alternate nicks enabled.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAltNicksTitle
data.value: Alternate nicks specific to {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformDesc
data.value: Use to override the global auto-perform settings for {0}. You can disable specific entries and add new ones. Furthermore, you can override it further for each channel once you join it.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformOnEvtDisabledStepsDesc
data.value: Each entry here is inherited from the global IRC preferences. Uncheck an item to prevent that command from running when the event happens for {0}. Leave it checked to enable it to run.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformOnEvtDisabledStepsTitle
data.value: Disable some steps for {0}?
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformTitle
data.value: {0} auto-perform options
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformWhenJoiningChanDesc
data.value: Use if you want a different set of commands to be run when joining any channel on {0} other than what was specified in the global IRC settings. This list can be overriden again for individual channels once you join them.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformWhenJoiningChanTitle
data.value: Commands to run when joining any channel on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformWhenJoiningNetDesc
data.value: Use if you want to customize the list of commands you want to run each time you connect to {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformWhenJoiningNetTitle
data.value: Commands to run when joining {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformWhenOpeningUserChatDesc
data.value: Use if you want a different set of commands to be run when you open a chat with any other user on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetAutoPerformWhenOpeningUserChatTitle
data.value: Commands to run when you open a chat window with another user
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetChanAliasesAdditionalDesc
data.value: Enter any additonal aliases you'd like to be enabled when {1} on {0} is the active view. You can't use any name if an alias with that name was inherited unless you disable it.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAliasesAdditionalTitle
data.value: Additional Aliases for {1} in the network {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAliasInheritedDesc
data.value: The checked aliases are active in {1}. Some were inherited from {0} while others came from your global IRC settings. Uncheck any you don't want for {1}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAliasInheritedTitle
data.value: Aliases inherited from {0} or global settings to {1}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAutoPerformAddedDesc
data.value: These steps will be performed after the entries above that are enabled in the order shown any time you join {1} on {1}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAutoPerformAddedTitle
data.value: Additional steps to run when joining {1} on the network {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAutoPerformDesc
data.value: Go here to change what steps are run when you join {1} on {0}. These override what you specified for the network (when joining any channel).
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAutoPerformInheritedDesc
data.value: These steps will be performed, if enabled, any time you join {1} on {0}. Disable entries as needed. If you want to change the order, disable entries and then create them below in the new order.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAutoPerformInheritedTitle
data.value: Inherited steps to take when joining {1} on the network {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanAutoPerformTitle
data.value: Override what happens when you join {1} on the network {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanDesc
data.value: These tabs let you override settings for {0} for {1}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanInheritedFromGlobalDesc
data.value: This inherited {0} came from your global IRC preferences.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the type name of the object being inherited. So if the object is a stalk word, something like "stalk word" would appear there.

data.name: strNetChanInheritedFromGlobalText
data.value: Global Settings

data.name: strNetChanInheritedFromNetDesc
data.value: This inherited {0} came from the network preferences for {1}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the type name of the object being inherited and "{1}" will be replaced with the network name.

data.name: strNetChanInheritedFromNetText
data.value: Network

data.name: strNetChanStalkWordsAddedDesc
data.value: These words, when they appear in {1} on {0}, will trigger alerts. These are in addition to those specified above.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanStalkWordsAddedTitle
data.value: More words to alert you when they appear in {1} on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanStalkWordsInheritedDesc
data.value: These words, when they appear in {1} on {0}, will trigger alerts. Those you specified in the global IRC settings as well as those from the network will be listed here.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanStalkWordsInheritedTitle
data.value: Stalk words inherited from {0} for {1}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanTimeStampDesc
data.value: Go here if you want {1} to use different time stamp settings than used by other {0} channels.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanTimeStampTitle
data.value: {1} time stamp overrides on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetChanTitle
data.value: {1} channel preferences on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network. "{1}" will be replaced with the name of the channel.

data.name: strNetConnDesc
data.value: Use to override the connection settings for {0}. This can be useful if a network needs different settings.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetConnOverrideDesc
data.value: Check to customize the connection settings to be more specific to {0}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetConnOverrideTitle
data.value: Override the global connection settings for {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetConnTitle
data.value: Connection settings specific to {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetDccOverrideDesc
data.value: Check to override any of the global settings within the settings for {0}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetDccOverrideTitle
data.value: Override the global DCC settings for {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetDesc
data.value: Lists preferences specific to the network {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetKnownChanDesc
data.value: This is a list of known channels on {0}. You've previously joined each of these channels. Each channel has preferences associated with it.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetKnownChanTitle
data.value: Known channels on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetNotifyDesc
data.value: If you want to know when other specific users come and go on {0}, add their nick here. You can manually do this from the command line with /notify
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetNotifyTitle
data.value: Nicks of remote users you want to know when they are on {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetNotifyWhenOnlineDesc
data.value: If any of these users leave the network {0}, join it, become away on {0}, or not away on {0}; Best Chat will notify you.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetNotifyWhenOnlineTitle
data.value: Notify for {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetStalkWordsAdditionalDesc
data.value: Use to specify additonal words you want to be alerted about when they happen in any view associated with {0}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetStalkWordsAdditionalTitle
data.value: Lists more stalk words specific to {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetStalkWordsDesc
data.value: This tab lets you override the stalk words for {0} from the default IRC global stalk words.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetStalkWordsInheritedDesc
data.value: more, once you join a channel, you can again override them.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetStalkWordsInheritedTitle
data.value: {0} has these stalk words from global IRC settings enabled
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetStalkWordsTitle
data.value: Override the stalk words for {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetTimeStampOverrideNetDesc
data.value: Check to override any of the global settings within the settings for {0}.
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetTimeStampOverrideNetTitle
data.value: Override the global time stamp settings for {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetTitle
data.value: {0} network preferences
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strStalkWordsText
data.value: stalk word

data.name: strOneStepText
data.value: one auto-perform text

data.name: strAliasParamNameBlank
data.value: Please enter a name for this parameter

data.name: strAliasParamNameNotUnique
data.value: The name you entered, “{0}” is taken. Please choose another name.
data.comment: All instances of "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the alias parameter as the user entered it.

data.name: strAliasParamTypeNotSet
data.value: Please choose a type for this alias paramter

data.name: strImportingAliasFailedBecauseTheStringIsNotAnAlias
data.value: Importing of an alais failed because the string isn’t an alias.

data.name: strCreatingNewAutoPerformStep
data.value: You’re creating a new auto-perform step.

data.name: strRequiredAliasParamsMustComeBeforeOptionalParams
data.value: You must place all required parameters before any optional parameters in the positioned parameter list.
